query.statement:
SELECT B.PSPID ,B.MAKE_MM || '01' AS MAKE_MM --,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS MAKE_MM ,B.WAERK ,B.DATE_S ,B.DATE_S2 ,B.DATE_S3 ,B.DATE_S4 ,B.DATE_S5 ,B.DATE_S6 ,B.DATE_S7 ,B.DATE_S8 ,B.DATE_S9 ,B.DATE_S10 ,B.DATE_S11 ,B.DATE_S12 ,B.DATE_S13 ,B.DATE_S14 ,B.DATE_S15 ,B.DATE_S16 ,B.DATE_S17 ,B.DATE_S18 ,B.DATE_S19 ,B.DATE_S20 ,B.DATE_S21 ,B.DATE_S22 ,B.SAYOOG ,B.SAYOOG2 ,B.SAYOOG3 ,B.SAYOOG4 ,B.SAYOOG5 ,B.SAYOOG6 ,B.SAYOOG7 ,B.SAYOOG8 ,B.SAYOOG9 ,B.SAYOOG10 ,B.SAYOOG11 ,B.SAYOOG12 ,B.SAYOOG13 ,B.SAYOOG14 ,B.SAYOOG15 ,B.SAYOOG16 ,B.SAYOOG17 ,B.SAYOOG18 ,B.SAYOOG19 ,B.SAYOOG20 ,B.SAYOOG21 ,B.SAYOOG22 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT1 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT1 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT2 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT2 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT3 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT3 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT4 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT4 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT5 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT5 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT6 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT6 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT7 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT7 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT8 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT8 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT9 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT9 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT10 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT10 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT11 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT11 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT12 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT12 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT13 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT13 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT14 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT14 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT15 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT15 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT16 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT16 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT17 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT17 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT18 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT18 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT19 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT19 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT20 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT20 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT21 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT21 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.UNIT22 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS UNIT22
,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR1 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR1 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR2 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR2 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR3 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR3 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR4 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR4 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR5 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR5 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR6 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR6 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR7 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR7 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR8 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR8 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR9 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR9 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR10 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR10 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR11 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR11 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR12 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR12 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR13 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR13 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR14 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR14 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR15 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR15 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR16 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR16 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR17 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR17 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR18 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR18 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR19 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR19 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR20 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR20 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR21 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR21 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(B.NETWR22 AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR22
,B.BIGO1 ,B.BIGO2 ,B.BIGO3 ,B.BIGO4 ,B.BIGO5 ,B.BIGO6 ,B.BIGO7 ,B.BIGO8 ,B.BIGO9 ,B.BIGO10 ,B.BIGO11 ,B.BIGO12 ,B.BIGO13 ,B.BIGO14 ,B.BIGO15 ,B.BIGO16 ,B.BIGO17 ,B.BIGO18 ,B.BIGO19 ,B.BIGO20 ,B.BIGO21 ,B.BIGO22 ,0 AS SF_AMOUNT2 ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_A AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_A ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_B AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_B ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_C AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_C ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_D AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_D ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_E AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_E ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_F AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_F ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_G AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_G ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(B.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.AMOUNT_H AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS AMOUNT_H ,0 AS SF_AMOUNT22 ,B.AMOUNT1 ,B.AMOUNT2 ,B.AMOUNT3 ,B.AMOUNT4 ,B.AMOUNT5 ,B.AMOUNT6 ,B.AMOUNT7 ,B.AMOUNT8 ,B.AMOUNT9 ,B.AMOUNT10 ,B.AMOUNT11 ,B.AMOUNT12 ,B.AMOUNT13 ,B.AMOUNT14 ,B.AMOUNT15 ,B.AMOUNT16 ,B.AMOUNT17 ,B.AMOUNT18 ,B.AMOUNT19 ,B.AMOUNT20 ,B.AMOUNT21 ,B.AMOUNT22 ,''AS AMOUNT_AA ,''AS AMOUNT_BB ,''AS AMOUNT_CC ,''AS AMOUNT_DD ,''AS AMOUNT_EE ,''AS AMOUNT_FF ,''AS AMOUNT_GG ,''AS AMOUNT_HH
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0501 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0502 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID AND A.MAKE_MM = B.MAKE_MM WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND B.MAKE_MM = #YYYYMMF# AND B.MAKE_MM = SUBSTR(#MAKE_MM#,1,6) AND B.PSPID = #POSID#
